alert.note: Alert for Northern Worcester; Southern Worcester (Massachusetts) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 25 at 2:36PM EDT by NWS Boston
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Worcester, north central Norfolk and south central Middlesex Counties through 330 PM EDT... At 235 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Ashland, or near Framingham, moving southeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Minor flooding. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor nuisance flooding of typically flood prone areas. Locations impacted include... Worcester, Framingham, Marlborough, Shrewsbury, Natick, Milford, Westborough, Grafton, Sudbury, Ashland, Auburn, Northbridge, Hopkinton, Northborough, Oxford, Holliston, Millbury, Wayland, Leicester and Southborough. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: Get indoors when you hear thunder. Do not resume outdoor activities until at least 30 minutes after the storm has passed. Do not drive through flooded roads or underpasses. Avoid low lying areas near small streams.
